# {TITLE} (Component)

   Launcher This components show a animated bar to be used while loading data

## Inputs

| Property | Type | Req   | Description                                 | Default |
| -------- | ---- | ----- | ------------------------------------------- | ------- |
| wider    |      | False | (Boolean)  Option for a bigger progress-bar |         |

## Example


```html
<st-progress-bar></st-progress-bar>
```
